formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com"],"subject":"“Whispers of the Past” – Cover Design Brief & Reference Materials","body":"Hi Ethan,

Great to hear from you! Below is the direct link to the full cover-design brief for Clara Bellamy’s “Whispers of the Past,” along with the supporting reference materials (synopsis, author bio, specs, colour palette, etc.). Everything is housed in a single Notion page so you can view or download items as needed.

Book Cover Design Brief – Whispers of the Past:
https://www.notion.so/Book-Cover-Design-Brief-Whispers-of-the-Past-20f0dc8fa0db81398fbae745e2421883

If anything in the brief isn’t clear, or if you’d prefer the assets in a different format, just let me know and I’ll send them right over.

Looking forward to seeing your initial concepts!

Best regards,
Jane McAllister
Senior Editor | Griffin & Locke Publishing House
jane.mc@griffinlocke.com"}

formatted_items.content:
Thought process:

1. Identified Ethan’s request for the cover brief and reference materials for “Whispers of the Past.”
2. Searched Notion with several queries (“Whispers of the Past cover brief,” “reference,” “synopsis,” etc.) to locate the required resources.
3. Located the main Notion page titled “Book Cover Design Brief – Whispers of the Past,” which consolidates the design brief and mentions attachments such as the synopsis and author bio.
4. Reviewed the content quickly to ensure it contains the essential information and no internal-only or sensitive commentary that shouldn’t reach an external freelancer.
5. Drafted a concise, professional email:
   • Provided a direct Notion link to the design brief, which includes all reference materials.  
   • Offered assistance with alternative file formats if needed.  
   • Maintained a friendly, collaborative tone suitable for an ongoing professional relationship.
6. Sent the email to Ethan’s address with the subject ““Whispers of the Past” – Cover Design Brief & Reference Materials.”

final_output:
Thought process:

1. Identified Ethan’s request for the cover brief and reference materials for “Whispers of the Past.”
2. Searched Notion with several queries (“Whispers of the Past cover brief,” “reference,” “synopsis,” etc.) to locate the required resources.
3. Located the main Notion page titled “Book Cover Design Brief – Whispers of the Past,” which consolidates the design brief and mentions attachments such as the synopsis and author bio.
4. Reviewed the content quickly to ensure it contains the essential information and no internal-only or sensitive commentary that shouldn’t reach an external freelancer.
5. Drafted a concise, professional email:
   • Provided a direct Notion link to the design brief, which includes all reference materials.  
   • Offered assistance with alternative file formats if needed.  
   • Maintained a friendly, collaborative tone suitable for an ongoing professional relationship.
6. Sent the email to Ethan’s address with the subject ““Whispers of the Past” – Cover Design Brief & Reference Materials.”
